title: Retire an article model
content:
Note  

  • You must have the appropriate permissions to be able to retire an article model.
  • If you retire an article model, this has no effect on existing article records.

To retire an article model means changing its status, as shown in the workflow snapshot at the top of the model, from Active to Retired.

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Knowledge > Models.

  2. Select the article model.

    Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click Retired, then Save.

Related topics

  • How to create an article model
  • How to edit an article model
  • How to activate an article model
